_description: ‘Benedictus deus in donis suis’, by Lydgate — nine 8-line stanzas

BodLauMis683.First Lines:
God departeth his gyfftes dyuerslyto summe he yeveth wit and
                    dyscressioun…
BodLauMis683.Last Lines:
…that grace and fortune your statis may amendeseith what god
                    sent blyssed mot he be
BodLauMis683.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 7-9.
